comment.author: 61361160@N00
comment._content: More usually known as the Ontario Legislative Building -- or Queen's Park, after the park it sits in. Arch. Richard A. Waite, 1893.

comment.author: 35607158@N06
comment._content: The statue is the so-called Officers' Monument: commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Officers'_Monument,_Queen...
